    • addEnchantments

      @NotNull public @NotNull ItemBuilder addEnchantments​(@NotNull @NotNull HashMap<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> enchantmentLevelsMap, boolean ignoreLevelRestriction)
      Parameters:
      enchantmentLevelsMap - to add on the item, a map of Enchantments with each of their corresponding levels.
      ignoreLevelRestriction - if set to 'true', levels may be higher than their maximum obtainable limits (e.g. Sharpness V).
      Returns:
      ItemBuilder
      Since:
      v3.1.0

    • addEnchantment

      @NotNull public @NotNull ItemBuilder addEnchantment​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment enchantment, int level, boolean ignoreLevelRestriction)
      Parameters:
      enchantment - to add on the item.
      level - of the specified enchantment.
      ignoreLevelRestriction - if set to 'true', the level may be higher than the enchantment's maximum obtainable limit (e.g. Sharpness V).
      Returns:
      ItemBuilder
      Since:
      v3.1.0

    • setGlowing

      @NotNull public @NotNull ItemBuilder setGlowing()
      Returns:
      ItemBuilder
      Since:
      v3.1.0 Adds a 'glowing' effect to the item by adding a useless enchantment. This will hide ALL enchantments on the item, even enchantments that are not applied by this method.

    • setSkullOwner

      @NotNull @Deprecated public @NotNull ItemBuilder setSkullOwner​(@NotNull @NotNull String username)
      Deprecated.
      Parameters:
      username - to set the skull texture of.
      Returns:
      ItemBuilder
      Since:
      v3.1.0 `setSkullOwner(OfflinePlayer)` should be used wherever possible, I am unsure whether that method supports the old versions. Thus, this only exists for legacy compatibility.
